rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Art Deco decorative elements and natural light sources from sidelights.
Spacious living room integrated with modern furniture and geometric Art Deco motifs, featuring a large window for Vastu alignment.
Elegant dining room with decorative moldings and a well-defined space for meals.
Fully equipped modern kitchen, designed with energy-efficient appliances and ample counter spaces. Incorporates Art Deco elements in cabinetry details.
Luxurious master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, richly decorated with art deco wallpaper and vintage accents.
Second bedroom featuring an expansive window to catch natural light, following Vastu principles for sleep.
Third bedroom with a view towards the garden and designed with soothing color palettes.
Home theater integrated within the living area, equipped with state-of-the-art soundproofing, seating arrangement, and ambient lighting for cinematic experience.
Well-lit study area that serves as a personal workspace or guest room, designed with Art Deco accents and functional ergonomics.
Separate service quarters for staff located near the kitchen for easy access while ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large garden window providing ample natural light and a view of the expansive garden space.
Service entrance for staff, discreetly located near kitchen area for efficient access.
